reviews.text: Tour of micro brewery by very knowledgeable guide and then the tasting of several craft beers which were all great. A must for lovers of real ale.

We had an amazing time today with the guys at Birra 08!! Veronica was our tour guide and she was amazing, answered all our questions and made the whole experience really fun. She made a nice and welcoming environment for us!! We are from barcelona and thought it was something everyone should do, be it as a tourist or from around Barcelona!!!

Take the time to tour this lovely little local brewery. See how the they make the beers and taste the range. Very friendly people who make some nice individually designed ales and should be supported.  Gracias!
